item.title: Bitcoin ‘Didn’t Do What It Was Supposed To Do’ In 2025, Says Galaxy CEO Novogratz
item.description: Bitcoin price movement has relied on investor narratives, said Novogratz, and excitement may not return until Bitcoin breaks $100,000.

item.title: Trump Vs. Late Night: How 2025 Turned A Comedy Staple Into An Intense Political War
item.description: “High salaries, no talent, really low ratings,” Trump says in his attack against late show hosts at CBS, ABC, and NBC.
